name: John Pennekamp Coral Reef State Park
description: Renowned for its underwater coral formations and marine life.

name: Molasses Reef
description: Part of the Florida Keys National Marine Sanctuary with diverse marine species.

name: Carysfort Reef
description: Known for elkhorn and staghorn coral formations, and sea turtles.

name: Grecian Rocks
description: Shallow reef system with colorful corals and marine life.

name: Alligator Reef
description: Impressive coral formations and diverse marine species.

name: Mosquito Bay, Key West
description: Known for its bright bioluminescent displays, especially during the summer.

name: Indian Key Channel, Islamorada
description: This area often has bioluminescent plankton, creating a stunning natural light show.

name: Banana Bay, Marathon
description: Another spot where you can witness bioluminescent waters, particularly in the summer and early fall.
